name: Euro-Global Conference on Biotechnology and Bioengineering
content: Magnus Group takes the honor to invite all the interested participants across the globe to attend Euro-Global Conference on Biotechnology and Bioengineering (ECBB 2021) taking place on September 06-08, 2021 in Rome, Italy with the theme ‘Addressing Current Challenges in Biotechnology and Bioengineering’. ECBB 2021 will be a platform to investigate recent research and advancements that can be useful to the researchers, which consists of explicit Keynote lectures, oral & poster presentations, workshops, and seminars from the experts, professors, dedicated professionals, scientists and young scholars in the field of Biotechnology and Bioengineering. Upcoming Biotechnology Conference: Biotechnology Conferences 2021| Bioengineering Conferences 2021| Biotechnology Conference | Bioengineering Conference | Biotechnology Congress | Biotechnology and Bioengineering Conference | Biotechnology and Bioengineering Conferences 2021 | Biotechnology Conferences | Bioengineering Conferences | Bioengineering congress| For scientific sessions please see: https://biotechnology-conferences.magnusgroup.org/program/scientific-sessions For Abstract submission PS: https://biotechnology-conferences.magnusgroup.org/submit-abstract For Registration PS : https://biotechnology-conferences.magnusgroup.org/register Conference Venue: Rome, Italy Dates: September 06 -08, 2021 For more details visit: https://biotechnology-conferences.magnusgroup.org/ Contact email: biotechnology@conferencemails.com Contact Phone: + 1(702) 988 2320 WhatsApp: +1 434 381 1007
